text: Maryamutaiya kumarar masih irai tutareyanri verillai. Ivarukku munnarum tutarkal palar vantu cenruvittanar. Ivarutaiya tayar mikka unmaiyanavar. Ivviruvarum (marra manitarkalaip pol) unavu unpavarkalakave iruntanar. Avarkalukku nam'mutaiya attatcikalai kontu evvaru telivakkinom enpatai (napiye!) Ninkal kavanippiraka! Avarkal evvaru ticai tiruppappatukirarkal enpataiyum kavanippiraka
